name: RessourceBot
description: A Ressource Management Tool for Guilds

GRB_DISCORD_TOKEN.description: This is the 'secret' from you 'App Bot User' you copied before.

CHANNEL.description: The channel the bot will listen to on your discord server

LANGUAGE.description: Language for the ressources, currenlty 'en' or 'de' are valid values.

OCR_RESULT.description: If set to 'on' the bot will say tell you the result of the OCR

DELETE_PICTURE_MESSAGE.description: If set to 'on' the bot will delete the message with pictures right after it has scanned it

JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS.description: Memory instructions so this project can run on a free heroku plan
